text: @maddow WOW! Now there’s an EXAMPLE OF A VERY IGNORANT, STUPID MAN WITH NO CLUE WHAT COVID19 IS MUCH LESS HOW DEALDY IT IS! What a terrifying person to have in charge at a time like this! OMG,Lord have mercy! OMG Florida you all had better vote THIS GUY OUT ASAP before he kills you all‼️
